title: Panigale V4 Lamborghini
description: The Panigale V4 Lamborghini is a special edition, numbered and limited to just 630 + 63 units, inspired by the Lamborghini Revuelto.

title: Panigale V4 Tricolore
description: The Panigale V4 Tricolore, produced in a limited edition of only 1,000 units, celebrates the seventh generation of Ducati's supersport bikes.

title: Panigale V2 Superquadro Final Edition
description: A special and exclusive Panigale V2 in 555 unites. Celebrating the pinnacle of Ducati's twin-cylinder engine evolution, the Superquadro.

title: Streatfighter Supreme
description: A special limited and numbered edition born from an exclusive new collaboration.

title: Monster Senna
description: A legendary Monster, made in a limited and numbered series of only 341 examples, to pay homage to the three world titles and 41 victories of one of the greatest and most beloved F1 drivers of all time, Ayrton Senna.

title: Diavel for Bentley
description: A masterpiece on two wheels. An exceptional fusion of audacity and elegance, allure and innovation that redefines the rules of style and exclusivity..

title: Panigale V4 SP2 30th Anniversario 916
description: The ultimate expression of Ducati sportiness in a limited and numbered edition, celebrating a timeless icon of design and performance.

title: Monster 30th Anniversario
description: The Monster in a new guise, as a limited, numbered edition, in celebration of its first 30 years of personality, performance and timeless style.

title: Ducati Streetfighter V4 Lamborghini
description: A numbered and limited edition of 630 + 63 units with a livery which recalls the design of the famous Lamborghini Hurac√°n STO (Super Trofeo Omologata). A magical combination of technology, performance and beauty, capable of making enthusiasts dream from the very first glance.

title: Ducati Panigale Superlegera V4
description: Engineering excellence, cutting-edge technology and aerodynamic design. The Superleggera V4 is the only homologated two-wheeler in the world with a carbon-fibre frame, swingarm and wheels for an unbeatable power/weight ratio of 1.54 hp/kg

title: Ducati Diavel 1260 Lamborghini
description: A motorcycle made in a limited and numbered edition of 630 units. Unconventional, unique, unmistakable.
